Special Message From Our School Counselors:
We are glad that so many of you have been able to stay in contact with our teachers and staff during this school closure. We miss every one of you very much!
During this time, we know that many of our students may have fears, concerns, or other emotional needs. Recently, we have provided all three of our school counselors cell phones specifically for the purpose of talking with our students. The numbers are published at our web site, on Facebook, and on Twitter. If you are signed up for it, you will also receive an email or text with the numbers.
If any of our students have fears, concerns, questions, or other emotional needs we encourage them to contact one of our counselors. Please continue to stay in contact with us. We are looking forward to seeing you soon.
